definitions: the fact of relating to the body as opposed to the mind; physical presence

examples.text: there's an emphasis on the physicality of the actors

shortDefinitions: fact of relating to body as opposed to mind

definitions: involvement of a lot of bodily contact or activity

examples.text: the intense physicality of a dancer's life
the sheer physicality of the game means fouls occur at regular intervals

shortDefinitions: involvement of bodily contact or activity
